body.p: Inhabitant of one of two cities named Jezreel. Two such persons are specifically named:
1. Naboth, who lived in the Jezreel in Issachar’s territory (1 Kgs 21:1-16; 2 Kgs 9:21, 25). See Jezreel (Place) #1.
2. David’s wife Ahinoam, who was a native of the Jezreel in Judah’s territory (1 Chr 3:1). See Jezreel (Place) #2.
